myBio: I am seeking an opportunity in the field of CS, leveraging my strong technical skills, passion for innovation, and dedication to contribute to a dynamic and collaborative work environment.

projects.projectDescription: The Mineral Particle Analysis System automates digital image processing to calculate geometric metrics to provide critical insights into particle size, elongation, spatial distribution, and contour characteristics.
PasterBot is a GUI Tool that allows users to paste content in text fields where pasting is disabled, and can automate text input on their computer
This project contains a simple implementation of a bigram language model using PyTorch. The model learns to predict the next character in a sequence based on the preceding character.
This is a bookmarker app, where you can store links that you find on the internet
